Package org.eclipse.eef.core.api.controllers

Interface IEEFWidgetController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEEFController
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEEFButtonController, IEEFCheckboxController, IEEFHyperlinkController, IEEFLabelController, IEEFListController, IEEFMultipleReferencesController, IEEFOnClickController, IEEFRadioController, IEEFSelectController, IEEFTextController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEEFCustomWidgetController, AbstractEEFOnClickController, AbstractEEFWidgetController, EEFButtonController, EEFCheckboxController, EEFHyperlinkController, EEFLabelController, EEFListController, EEFRadioController, EEFSelectController, EEFTextController

    public interface IEEFWidgetController
extends IEEFController
    The Widget controller is responsible for the refresh of the label of a widget.
